About.title: About
About.content: Hello, I'm Matheus, a Full Stack developer. I am currently taking two postgraduate courses Lato Sensu, one in Full Stack Development and Cloud Computing and another in Cloud Computing Architecture and Projects. In addition, I have experience in Web development using technologies such as React, Javascript, HTML, CSS, TypeScript, Next.js, among others. I am always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn and grow as a developer.

bendev.title: Front-end Developer
bendev.description: Web and mobile application development using React, React Native, Next.js, among others technologies.
